title: Meatballs and Kraut
directions: Mix meatballs, sauerkraut, chili sauce, white sugar, brown sugar, hot water, and vinegar in a slow cooker, stirring to dissolve sugar. Cook on High for 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen cooked meatballs, thawed
1 (12 ounce) bottle ketchup-style chili sauce (such as Heinz)
